Title: Zodiac
Overview: A cartoonist teams up with an ace reporter and a law enforcement officer to track down an elusive serial killer.
Tagline: There's more than one way to lose your life to a killer.
Keywords: california, san francisco, killing, journalist, newspaper, mass murder, planned murder, embassy, victim, threat to death, victim of murder, code, police, murder, serial killer, reporter
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, Warner Bros., Phoenix Pictures
Cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Robert Downey Jr., Mark Ruffalo
